abstract.text: Shape is a term to describe the number and size of the dimensions of an N dimension (ND) array.

inlineContent.text: is an N dimensional array.  The number of dimensions is described by

Some of these functions can manipulate the shape without changing the contents while others
will moves rows and columns as they modify the shape.
